creditline: Gift of the Charles Bolles Rogers Family: Frederick Van Dusen Rogers, Nancy Rogers Pierson, Mary Rogers Savage
description: one of a set of three tea caddies with sharkskin case
inscription:
Marks; Inscriptions

Each engraved on one side with arms of Stephens impaling Webster in scrolling rococo cartouche.
markings:
fully marked, underside; lion passant and maker\'s mark, bezel of cover; arms of Stevens impaling Webster, in scrolling rococo cartouche, engraved, on one side

Each fully marked on underside.
.1 with lion passant and maker\'s mark on bezel of cover.
.2 and .3 with lion passant only on bezel of cover.
medium: Silver with shagreen covered box with silver mounts
object_name: Tea Caddy, from a set of tea caddies with fitted casket
title: Tea Caddy, from a set of tea caddies with fitted casket
